display.name: activateUser
display.description: Activates a user in Okta (asynchronous operation). This operation can only be performed on users with a STAGED status.

display.name: createUser
display.description: Creates a user in Okta based on selected parameters.

display.name: deactivateApplication
display.description: Deactivates an Application in Okta.

display.name: deactivateUser
display.description: Deactivates a user in Okta (asynchronous action). This operation can only be performed on users that do not have a DEPROVISIONED status. This action cannot be recovered!

display.name: deleteApplication
display.description: Deletes an Application in Okta.

display.name: deleteImportSession
display.description: Delete an Okta import session.

display.name: activateGroupRule
display.description: Activates a specific Group rule by ID from your organization.

display.name: removeGroupFromApplication
display.description: Removes a group assignment from an application in Okta.

display.name: resetPassword
display.description: Reset a user’s password in Okta.

display.name: unsuspendUser
display.description: Unsuspends a user in Okta and returns them to the ACTIVE state  This operation can only be performed on users that have a SUSPENDED status.

display.name: bulkUserImport
display.description: Bulk import users for creating, updating, deactivating, and deleting in Okta.

display.name: deleteGroupRule
display.description: Removes a specific Group rule by ID from your organization.

display.description: For the associated user specified by ID, returns the user id and self link for the primary user in the relationship specified by primary name in Okta.

display.description: Enumerates group assignments for an application in Okta.

display.name: readImportSession
display.description: Read information about an Okta import session.

display.name: readGroup
display.description: Get information about a specific group in Okta.

display.name: updateGroup
display.description: Updates the profile for a group of OKTA_GROUP type from your organization.

display.name: readGroupRule
display.description: Fetches a specific Group rule by ID from your organization.

display.name: triggerImportSession
display.description: Trigger an import session in Okta that is ready for processing. This step should occur after bulk importing users.

display.name: removeUserFromGroup
display.description: Removes a user from a group with OKTA_GROUP type.

display.name: searchSystemLogs
display.description: Search for log events from your organization's system log in Okta.

display.name: setLinkedObjectValueForPrimary
display.displayname: Set Linked Object Value for Primary
display.description: Sets the associated user and the primary user specified by ID for the relationship specified by primary name in Okta.

display.name: suspendUser
display.description: Suspends a user in Okta. This operation can only be performed on users with an ACTIVE status. The user will have a status of SUSPENDED when the process is complete.

display.name: searchGroupRules
display.description: Search all Group rules for your organization.
